May 2023

World Health Organization
Geneva, Switzerland

Disclaimer
The estimates of excess mortality associated with COVID-19 pandemic have undergone a country consultation process. The estimates presented here may differ from, and should not be regarded as, the official national statistics of individual WHO Member States.
